title: Bluetooth cuts out during playback when the device is turned off
content:
This happens on Spotify, Google Play Music, and YouTube Music with Sony Wireless Buds and Apple Airpods.  I've tried (along with re-setting and turning off absolute volume):

Closing the music app
Restarting Bluetooth
Clearing the music app data
Disabling battery saver for the music app
Disabling battery saver for the device
Disabling adaptive battery for the device
